forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Areas of fog early, then partly cloudy this afternoon. High 13C. Winds WNW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Areas of fog early, then partly cloudy this afternoon. High near 55F. Winds WNW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Areas of fog. Low 8C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Foggy. Low 47F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A mix of clouds and sun in the morning giving way to a few showers during the afternoon. High 12C. Winds W at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 30%.
forecastday.fcttext: A mix of clouds and sun early, then becoming cloudy later in the day. Slight chance of a rain shower. High 54F. Winds WSW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers in the evening becoming a steady light rain overnight. Low around 10C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 80%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers in the evening becoming a steady light rain overnight. Low 49F. Winds SSE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 80%.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Steady light rain in the morning. Showers continuing in the afternoon. High near 10C. Winds NNW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: Light rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers in the afternoon. High 51F. Winds NNW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few clouds. Low 4C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Some clouds early will give way to generally clear conditions overnight. Low 38F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Generally sunny despite a few afternoon clouds. Slight chance of a rain shower. High around 10C. Winds W at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Sunshine and some clouds. Slight chance of a rain shower. High around 50F. Winds W at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies early followed by some light rain later at night. Low 6C. Winds SSE at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies early followed by some light rain later at night. Low 43F. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with periods of rain. High near 10C. Winds SSW at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain likely. High near 50F. Winds S at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers early with clearing later at night. Low 4C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers early with clearing later at night. Low around 40F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few clouds from time to time. High around 10C. E winds shifting to NW at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly sunny skies. High 51F. E winds shifting to NW at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A mostly clear sky. Low 4C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly clear. Low near 40F. Winds SE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Intervals of clouds and sunshine. High 12C. Winds SSW at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Intervals of clouds and sunshine. High 53F. Winds S at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy. Low 8C. Winds SSE at 15 to 30 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Overcast. Low 47F. Winds SSE at 10 to 20 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers, with winds diminishing in the afternoon. High 12C. Winds SSE at 30 to 50 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers, with winds diminishing later in the day. High 54F. Winds SSE at 20 to 30 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. Low 7C. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. Low around 45F. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. High 12C. Winds S at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Overcast with rain showers at times. High 54F. Winds S at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers in the evening, then partly cloudy overnight. Low 7C. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers in the evening, then partly cloudy overnight. Low around 45F. Winds SSE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Increasing clouds with showers arriving sometime in the afternoon. High 13C. Winds SSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly cloudy in the morning then periods of showers later in the day. High around 55F. Winds S at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Overcast with rain showers at times. Low 7C. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. Low near 45F. Winds SSE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.
